title: Interpretation of money in a dream, meaning of seeing money in a dream

preview.html: Paper money in a dream Money in a dream by Ibn Sirin Receiving money in a dream Money in a dream Money in a dream for a pregnant woman Money in a dream What does it mean? Interpretation of a dream about money Money in a dream from death If you find money in a dream, this foretells that you will face minor problems, followed by many joys and the situation will change. If you pay money in a dream, this is a bad omen. If you get a gold coin, it means that goodness and happiness are coming your way. If you lose money in the dream, this foretells that you will face some problems in the family environment and that your business will face some obstacles. If you count the money in a dream and find it missing, this foretells that you will pay a sum of money and be sad about it. If you dream that you stole money, this indicates that you are in danger and that you should weigh your steps. Saving money in a dream symbolizes status, wealth and peace of mind. If you dream that you bought money, this foretells that you will rent something. If you dreamed that you found a list of securities and that a girl asked you for it, this portends that your friend will cause you to lose in your business. The person who saw the dream will discover that he is living far from reality and is unconsciously wasting his money. This type of dream is a warning. If you dream that you have a lot of money, but borrowed heavily, this foretells that others will consider you a prominent man, but those who get close to you will find that you are mercenary and indifferent. If a girl dreams that she is spending borrowed money, this foretells that she will be caught treacherous and lose a valuable friend. Meaning of a dream about money for single people If an unmarried woman sees that she is receiving money from someone, this indicates that she will receive a valuable gift or that she is preparing for marriage soon. If an unmarried girl sees that she is receiving money from someone, this indicates that she will receive a valuable gift or that she is preparing for marriage soon. Banknotes, you will witness some happy events in the coming period. Paper money is evidence of goodness in one dream. As for spending money in an unmarried girl’s dream, it is a sign of bad and unhappy events that she will experience in the days that follow the dream. If you spend the money you borrowed from someone, you will lose a friend. – An unmarried girl can find money in her dream, and this also does not indicate kindness, it means that she will face some problems, but soon she will find solutions to them. A single person’s dream of money indicates He is trying to achieve his goals. If she is seen outside her home, this indicates the presence of worries in her home. Coins in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate that she will face many problems and crises in the coming periods. - A single woman can see herself saving money, and this indicates great wealth that she will enjoy in the future. Interpretation Dream of a hammer of money: In a dream, a man speaks well and looks good if he does not receive his salary, and if he receives his salary, then he is a hypocrite or a gossip. Whoever sees that he is minting money and it is worth it, he will take it. Seeing him indicates a guardian, preacher, painter, or writer. Perhaps his vision indicates what imposes its limits. It was said that the miner memorizes the prayers and is entrusted with him. Interpretation of dreams from Ibn Sirin’s money

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the Crown Prince in a dream

preview.html: Seeing an heir in a dream: Seeing an heir, princes, or kings is a popular vision for the majority of jurists and interpreters. This vision is interpreted in more than one way and is praiseworthy in most cases, and its interpretation is determined according to the details and the condition of the viewer. In this article, we explain all the connotations and situations in detail. Seeing an heir in a dream. Seeing an heir expresses a bright future, the luxury of life and the growth of the world, great ambitions, high ambition, and insight. And if he sees The Crown Prince smiles at him, as this is a sign of goodness, fertility, and abundance of sustenance. Accepting a gift from him is evidence of his assuming high positions and being promoted at work, and eating with him is a sign of authority and reputation. Power and achieving planned goals. Seeing the heir in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the crown prince or princes indicates high status, honor, and high standing, and whoever sees himself as a prince, this indicates the responsibilities and duties that limit him. And whoever sees the heir while he is free, this indicates that he He will get married soon, and whoever sees the heir divorcing his wife, being fired from his job, or leaving his job, and if a person is imprisoned, this vision shows comfort and freedom. And dispersing sorrows and illusions. If he sees that he is talking with the heir, this indicates the correct opinion and valuable advice, and sitting with him is evidence of sitting with those in authority, and talking to him in a low voice is evidence of a request. Help and need. The smile of the Crown Prince indicates kindness, charity, and gifts, while his anger indicates the cessation of difficult works and endeavors, and the company of the Crown Prince indicates power, great status, abundance, and great benefit. Seeing an heir in a single woman’s dream. A single heir indicates marriage in the near future and the start of new projects aimed at... To achieve security and reassurance, and talking to him is evidence of gaining knowledge and wisdom and achieving goals. Whoever sees that he embraced the heir and gained safety and protection, and if he smiles at her, this is great satisfaction and abundance. Kissing the heir indicates praise and commendation, and mentioning her virtues. Marrying the heir symbolizes blessing. And reward, harvesting desires and goals, and being associated with him is good news for gaining status and prestige and trying to improve living conditions. Seeing an heir in a dream for a married woman. An heiress in her dream shows her prestige and status with her husband, her great status among people, high vitality, obtaining many benefits, and changing circumstances for the better. And ecstasy with victory and happiness. And if she sees that the Crown Prince is smiling at her, then this is an improvement in her living conditions, and if she sees that her husband resembles the Crown Prince, then this is the position that she will obtain, and an excellent position that she will enjoy, and control and control. And dignity among people. But a disagreement with the heir is evidence of a disagreement with the husband

Marrying the heir symbolizes blessing and reward, and harvesting desires and goals, and being associated with him is good news for gaining status and prestige and trying to improve living conditions. Seeing the heir in a dream for a married woman The heir in her dream shows her prestige and status with her husband, her great status among people, high vitality, obtaining many benefits, changing circumstances for the better, and ecstasy with victory and pleasure. And if she sees that the crown prince The covenant smiles at her, this is an improvement in her living conditions, and if she sees that her husband looks like the crown prince, this is the position she gets, and an excellent position she enjoys, and control and dominance. And dignity among people. But the dispute with the heir is evidence of a dispute with the husband

title: Interpretation of the color pink in a dream: Seeing the color pink in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dream about the color pink indicates love, tenderness, closeness, and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as wearing a pink dress for a divorced woman. Pink shoes, buy a pink shirt and wear pink pants, and the color is called pink, fuchsia or baby also by Ibn Sirin and more explanations in continuation of the topic below: Interpretation of the color pink in a dream Seeing the color pink in a dream It is linked to the feminine world, especially with young girls If we dream of pink clothes Small, it means that we are backward in the world of childhood. It also symbolizes the rebirth of a part of the human personality. The color pink is a symbol of love, tenderness, femininity, and fertility. The dreamer is linked to the relationship with the other party, whether it is the lover, the fiancé, or the husband. Whoever receives a bouquet of pink roses in a dream is in agreement with the lover. And whoever gives the lover a bouquet of pink roses, a quarrel will arise between them. The one who chooses pink roses himself will get what he wants in his relationship with his partner, unlike the person who throws pink roses from his hands. As for the roses scattered everywhere, they indicate an engagement or a wedding soon. One sees himself wearing pink clothes, then he will be in harmony with his partner, but if he sees his partner in pink clothes, he will fulfill a positive promise from him. Whoever walks in a dream on a flowery path and does not reach the path to the end, his relationship with his partner will not have a happy ending. The color pink indicates In a dream, it indicates progress and maturity in the dreamer’s personality. The pink color shows connections and relationships. Whoever receives a bouquet of roses from his beloved, their relationship will be fine. As for whoever is seen giving his lover a pink bouquet of roses, it is expected that problems will arise between them. Whoever sees himself choosing pink roses, his relationship with the party will go well. As it should be, while anyone who throws pink roses from his hands will face problems in his relationship with those he loves. Seeing pink roses spread around the place indicates marriage or engagement, while walking on an endless path of flowers indicates that the end of one’s relationship with the one he loves is the end. Unfortunate. Interpretation of a dream about pink by Ibn Sirini. Pink or rose color in a dream indicates ambition and the desire to achieve dreams. Pink color in a dream indicates a happy life. Pink color in a dream is good news and a praiseworthy vision for the dreamer. Buying pink shoes in a dream is evidence that The dreamer is a good person. Interpretation of a dream about the color pink: Seeing a girl in a dream wearing pink clothes, this is a sign of kindness and love. If a girl dreams that she is wearing a pink dress, this is evidence of good luck. The color pink in a bachelor’s dream indicates the realism in which the girl lives. Seeing a girl In a dream, she wears pink shoes, this is an indication of her imminent marriage. Interpretation of a dream of pink for a married woman: The color pink in a married woman’s dream indicates stability in married life. If a married woman sees that she is wearing a pink dress, this indicates the joy that will come to her

title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing a dove in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the vision of hunting pigeons? It means the money you get after struggle and hardship. What does it mean to see feeding young pigeons? This means that you will teach a woman things in religious sciences. The interpretation of the vision of pigeons? It means a loyal man and friend who will not betray you. What is the meaning of the vision of slaughtering 3 pigeons or slaughtering An odd number of pigeons? Evidence that it is the birth of a married man. What is the interpretation of seeing white pigeon feathers? Evidence of wealth and luxury after poverty and destitution. Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream: Seeing pigeons hunting means money that is received after fighting and hardships from men in an important position. Dreaming of a dove means a person who is close to God Almighty and whose supplications are heard. A dove means a loyal and friendly person who will not betray you. A bathroom designated for unmarried couples means a lover who improves your neighborhood, and with whom you will enjoy peace and comfort. It was said about washing for someone who has a sick relative that the word is approaching, and God knows best. It symbolizes a lady who has many children. A dove means a man who has many children but does not support them. Seeing a dream about a slaughtered dove. If an unmarried man sees himself slaughtering a dove, this means that he will marry a humble girl. A married man who slaughters a dove means that he He will soon have a son if he slaughters a pigeon. If your wife is pregnant and you dream that you slaughtered pigeons and their number was even, this means that you will have a female. A dream about slaughtering 3 pigeons or slaughtering an extra pigeon is said about the birth of a male for a married man. Interpretation of a dream about a small pigeonIf a man dreams about hunting domestic pigeons If he looks into the eyes of doves and this is not in their nature, then his wife is falling behind in her religion. Throwing stones at doves or something similar is mocking a chaste woman and talking about her bad reputation. Feeding doves means that you The Lady of Religious or Secular Sciences will teach you. Dreaming about money from pigeon feathers is what you saw about feathers and profit from it. Seeing a dream about a white dove. Interpretation of seeing a white dove means the psychological peace you bring to others. If a white dove is standing on your head, it means that you are close to Almighty God. Follow Religious teachings. If the dove is black and ugly, this means that you are transgressing in your worship, or that your actions are bad and there is no good in them. A dream about pigeon eggs: Pigeon eggs mean money and offspring. Interpretation of seeing pigeons and seeing eggs in a dream means money that you will get in many different ways Perhaps from promotion or trade, or the participation of an experienced person in projects, even if you are really rich Perhaps eggs mean the birth of good males, even if your life is turbulent Doves mean family peace and stability As for wings White doves represent wealth and prosperity after poverty and misery.

title: Interpretation of the thigh in a dream

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we show you the interpretation of the thigh in a dream according to what was presented by the scholar Ibn Sirin in his book Interpretation of Dreams. Sirin, this vision has many connotations that differ depending on the state of the thigh that the sleeper saw, and the meaning of this vision varies depending on the state of the sleeper, and for this we will show you through the encyclopedia’s interpretation that the thighs you see in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Interpretation of the thigh in a dream by Ibn Siriniri, the great scholar Muhammad. Ibn Sirin said that if the sleeper sees in his dream a wound in his thigh and the wound does not heal, then this vision indicates the presence of an absent person in the family who will not return. If the sleeper dreams of pain in his thigh, this is a sign that the dreamer suffers from loneliness and insecurity. Seeing the thigh turns into Copper indicates that the fortuneteller is committing sins and transgressions and that he must repent and return to the straight path. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a severed thigh in a dream means travel and exile, and that the dreamer will leave his family. Interpretation of a dream about a thigh in a dream Al-Osaimi Fahd Al-Osaimi says that seeing a thigh in a dream shows strength And the toughness of the one who sees it. Whoever dreams of cutting off his thigh, this vision indicates abandonment of the homeland. Exposing the thigh in a dream indicates family problems. If the sleeper sees in his dream that his thigh is strong, then this is a good vision that shows the dreamer’s strength and the existence of family ties between his family. Interpretation of a dream about thigh in a dream Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi says that if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is suffering from pain in the thigh, then this vision shows the dreamer’s humiliation of his family. Al-Nabulsi explained that the thigh in the dream symbolizes the family and the family or the homeland and the tribe and the tribe, and that seeing it in good condition means good relationships and family cohesion, and seeing it in Bad condition means the problems that a person suffers from. With his family or moving away from his homeland. Interpretation of seeing the thigh in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream her legs being cut off from the thigh area, then this vision indicates her death in estrangement far from her family, and only God knows the timings. If an unmarried girl sees that her leg is exposed This is a sign of her inability to achieve the goals she seeks. If an unmarried girl dreams of severe pain in her thigh in a dream, this vision indicates that she remembers the mistakes of others and always directs them to do harm, and she must give up this bad habit. Interpretation of a dream about thigh for a married woman says Dream interpretation scholars: If a married woman sees in her dream that her thigh has turned to metal, this is a vision warning her of the necessity of repentance and abandoning the sins she has committed. Seeing a severed thigh in a married woman’s dream indicates that her husband will travel and die in exile, and only God knows the time. Exposing the legs The thighs in a married woman’s dream indicate her failure in life. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman’s thigh. Dream interpretation scholars say that if a pregnant woman sees her thigh and its shape is strange, this is a sign of the difficulties she will face during pregnancy. Seeing a severed thigh in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates difficulty in childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a thigh
preview.text: In the following paragraphs, we show you the interpretation of the thigh in a dream according to what was presented by the scholar Ibn Sirin in his book Interpretation of Dreams. Sirin, this vision has many connotations that differ depending on the state of the thigh that the sleeper saw, and the meaning of this vision varies depending on the state of the sleeper, and for this we will show you through the encyclopedia’s interpretation that the thighs you see in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Interpretation of the thigh in a dream by Ibn Siriniri, the great scholar Muhammad. Ibn Sirin said that if the sleeper sees in his dream a wound in his thigh and the wound does not heal, then this vision indicates the presence of an absent person in the family who will not return. If the sleeper dreams of pain in his thigh, this is a sign that the dreamer suffers from loneliness and insecurity. Seeing the thigh turns into Copper indicates that the fortuneteller is committing sins and transgressions and that he must repent and return to the straight path. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a severed thigh in a dream means travel and exile, and that the dreamer will leave his family. Interpretation of a dream about a thigh in a dream Al-Osaimi Fahd Al-Osaimi says that seeing a thigh in a dream shows strength And the toughness of the one who sees it. Whoever dreams of cutting off his thigh, this vision indicates abandonment of the homeland. Exposing the thigh in a dream indicates family problems. If the sleeper sees in his dream that his thigh is strong, then this is a good vision that shows the dreamer’s strength and the existence of family ties between his family. Interpretation of a dream about thigh in a dream Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi says that if the sleeper sees in his dream that he is suffering from pain in the thigh, then this vision shows the dreamer’s humiliation of his family. Al-Nabulsi explained that the thigh in the dream symbolizes the family and the family or the homeland and the tribe and the tribe, and that seeing it in good condition means good relationships and family cohesion, and seeing it in Bad condition means the problems that a person suffers from. With his family or moving away from his homeland. Interpretation of seeing the thigh in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream her legs being cut off from the thigh area, then this vision indicates her death in estrangement far from her family, and only God knows the timings. If an unmarried girl sees that her leg is exposed This is a sign of her inability to achieve the goals she seeks. If an unmarried girl dreams of severe pain in her thigh in a dream, this vision indicates that she remembers the mistakes of others and always directs them to do harm, and she must give up this bad habit. title: What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman eating yellow watermelon in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman eating yellow watermelon in a dream? There are many dreams and visions that occur in a dream, and scientists have determined that there are two types of visions, the first is real and there must be certain factors for the vision to be correct, and among the indications is that it is promising goodness and satisfying for the soul and heart. While the second type of dreams is unrealistic due to the influence of the Esoteric mind, and we should not get carried away and care about such visions. Scientists explain dreams and visions that a pregnant woman’s dream of a yellow watermelon means that she is going through a difficult period full of tension and anxiety, perhaps fear of pregnancy and childbirth, so her dreams were affected. Seeing yellow watermelon during the harvest season is interpreted by a pregnant woman, as this means that the birth will pass quietly and that the child will be healthy and in good health. Seeing yellow watermelon is interpreted for a pregnant woman and she is happy, then this is evidence of the stability of her family life with her husband. If a pregnant woman sees yellow watermelon In a dream and buying it, it means that she will receive happy news during the coming period. Cutting watermelon in a dream for a pregnant womanWe discuss the interpretation of cutting watermelon in a dream for a pregnant woman, through the following paragraph. A dream of cutting watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream is interpreted as an indication that she will have abundant prosperity in The coming days, and therefore it is considered a dream worthy of praise. Seeing a watermelon and taking a piece of it for a pregnant woman means that she will give birth to a healthy child who is fair with his parents. Having a vision of cutting a watermelon in a dream and a pregnant woman is unhappy, this is a sign that she has heard disturbing news, but she must be patient until The crisis ends. Interpretation of a dream about yellow watermelon for a single woman. Many girls wonder about the interpretation of the meaning of having a yellow watermelon in a dream, so we discuss the interpretation of the dream in the following paragraph. Seeing yellow watermelon in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will enjoy goodness and happiness and all her dreams and aspirations. Seeing watermelon in a dream An unmarried woman is interpreted as an independent and reasonable person who has many good qualities. A dream about watermelon indicates that she was sad in the dream, so this is a sign that she is surrounded by a bad person who is trying to cause her problems, and the dream came to warn her to be careful. Some scholars believe that the presence Watermelon in a single woman’s dream indicates her connection in a way that is not matched by the same feeling, and this is what she should focus more on in her life. Seeing watermelon out of season means that you will suffer from some problems, whether at work or in marriage. Interpretation of a dream of yellow watermelon for a married woman in this paragraph We consider the interpretation of a dream about yellow watermelon in a dream for a married woman as follows. Seeing yellow watermelon in a dream for a married woman means that she is sad because of a marital problem, but dreaming about it is a sign of the end of the crisis and the return of life to normal again. Seeing watermelon in a dream for a married woman means That you will hear happy news during the coming period, especially if she felt happy when she saw the dream. Seeing watermelon in a dream for a married woman is interpreted as a mother.

title: Interpretation of a dream about selling gold

preview.html: Regarding selling gold in a dream, there are many interpretations of this vision, which we will learn about in detail through the topic below, so stay with us for more interpretations through our Mufassir website. Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a single girlImam Ibn Sirin says: Selling gold In a dream, it is one of the visions that it is not advisable to see. It symbolizes the presence of many obstacles in the dreamer’s life, which make her unable to prove herself and achieve her ambitions in life. Seeing a beloved gold being sold to unmarried women in a dream means that she has lost something in her life that meant A lot for her. No matter how engaged she is and who sold her network in the dream, her engagement may be interrupted due to many problems and disagreements. It has been said that selling broken gold in a dream is good news. It portends the occurrence of a happy event for the dreamer that will compensate her for what she suffered in the previous period. Also, the vision of selling broken gold It indicates marriage, and God knows best. See also: I dreamed that I was collecting gold from the ground. Interpretation of seeing gold sold in a dream for a married woman. Seeing selling gold in a dream indicates a married woman. About the many problems and difficulties in the life of the dreamer, and this is according to what was stated in Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. And whoever sold Her gold in a dream means a serious financial crisis, and God knows best. Interpretation scholars say that selling a wedding ring in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the dreamer’s irrevocable divorce. If she sells a wedding ring and buys another, she gets married after waiting for another man, and God knows best. To dream of selling gold Buying silver indicates that it is a dream. However, the dreamer is sacrificing worldly goods for the sake of her children. Whoever sells gold to buy diamonds is good news of a radical change in her financial situation, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a gold dinar in her dream, this means that she is looking for money. Whoever sells a gold dinar in her dream will get rid of sadness, worry, and distress, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing gold in a dream for a man and its meaning. Seeing selling gold in a man’s dream is completely different from seeing a woman, and this vision is considered in a man’s dream. It is a sign for him that good things are coming and that the doors of livelihood will open. For him and God will bless him from where he does not expect it. Whoever sells his wife’s gold in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will get a new job opportunity in a prestigious place with a rewarding salary. Seeing gold coins in a dream is good news that you will soon hear good news. When a man sees in a dream, this It is like donating his gold to another person. It is a sign of his pure repentance for the sake of God. Whoever gives gold to a man he knows will help him, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about finding gold in the sea. The meaning of seeing gold sold in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about selling gold in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence However, the dreamer feels severe pain during her pregnancy. It was also said: Selling gold to a pregnant woman is a sign that the fortuneteller is suffering from a serious illness. Selling golden legs in a dream indicates the loss of the fetus in the first months of pregnancy. And whoever sees in her dream that she is selling broken gold, it is a sign To heal and heal

Selling golden legs in a dream indicates the loss of the fetus in the first months of pregnancy. And whoever sees in her dream that she is selling broken gold is a sign of healing and recovery

title: Interpretation of a dream about a woman staying away from her husband according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a woman leaving her husband in a dream carries many interpretations and multiple meanings that vary depending on the dreamer’s condition in his dream and the nature of the dream he is seeing. Scientists interpret the dream as a sign of many problems in real life. Interpretation of a woman’s dream about leaving her husband: Seeing a woman walking away from her husband in a dream is a sign. On difficult family disputes, the father suffers from the dreamer in real life and finds it very difficult to get rid of them, as it takes a lot of time and effort. Achieving her goal. Interpretation of a dream about a wife staying away from her husband in a married woman’s dream is evidence of a major deterioration in the marital relationship and the presence of many problems and obstacles that prevent the spouses from settling down, and their relationship ends. In divorce without compensation. Seeing a married woman’s husband leaving her in a dream is a sign of the renewal of the relationship of love and understanding between them again and an increase in sincere love, in addition to entering a happy period in which the husband tries to do many things that will bring her happiness. His wife’s heart. Interpretation of a dream about a woman being away from her husband by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a woman being away from her husband in a dream as evidence of the many marital disputes that occur between them, which are a reason for distance and abandonment, in addition to the development of unresolved problems that lead to divorce. The husband’s distance About his wife in a dream due to his death is a sign of many worries and sorrows that will fall into the dreamer’s life in the coming period and force her to enter an unstable psychological state that gets worse on a daily basis. It puts him in a state of isolation. Abandoning his wife in a dream is a sign that the husband is losing his job and is suffering from a major financial crisis that causes debts to pile up on his head and he finds it very difficult to get out of the crisis safely without suffering a major loss. Interpretation of a dream about a husband who is angry with his wife in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Rape The husband in a pregnant woman’s dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, is a sign of premature birth and she feels very tired as a result, but the dreamer ends the danger for good and gives birth to her child. In peace very soon. Seeing a husband angry with his wife in a dream is evidence of a difficult period in which the dreamer is suffering from harsh and painful circumstances that leave her in a state of sadness and misery and she needs some time to be able to overcome them. Rape of a married couple in a dream is a sign of the strong relationship that binds them in reality and increased trust between them, in addition to their happy and stable life without complex problems and obstacles. Interpretation of a dream about a woman leaving her husband for a pregnant woman. The distance of a pregnant wife from her husband in a dream and her feeling of happiness is evidence of many problems and difficulties. Which stands in her way and prevents her from resolving marital disputes easily, which leads to the deterioration of the relationship between the spouses. And their arrival at separation. The crying of a pregnant woman in a dream as a result of her separation from her husband is a sign of the final disappearance of sadness and unhappiness and the return to her normal life and relief from the difficulties and tribulations that she endured during the past period. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman moving away
